text:
She announced she was expecting her fourth child, and first with fiancé Michael O'Neill, last month.
And Danielle Lloyd was truly glowing on Friday, as she headed out for a relaxing day of pampering.
The former beauty queen displayed her growing bump in a grey sports tracksuit and matching trainers as she headed to her local nail salon in Sutton Coldfield.
Scroll down for video
Nailed it! Danielle Lloyd, 33, certainly looked every inch the glowing mother-to-be on Friday, as she headed out for a day of pampering
The glamour model proudly showed off her ever-blossoming bump in the casual grey marl tracksuit.
The zip hooded top was of a form fit, to gently cling to her burgeoning belly, while the skinny trousers highlighted her long and lean legs to all.
Keeping co-ordinated from head to toe, the former Celebrity Big Brother star teamed the ensemble with matching grey sports trainers, complete with structured white soles.
Casual chic: The zip hooded top was of a form fit, to gently cling to her burgeoning belly, while the skinny trousers highlighted her long and lean legs to all
Despite remaining casual in her outfit, the mother-of-three upped the glamour in her hair and make-up - keeping her brunette locks sleek and adding a sweeping of bronzer to her cheeks.
Danielle beamed widely as she headed in to her local nail salon, showing no signs of fatigue from pregnancy - which she announced last month.
The new arrival with be Danielle's fourth child, as she already has three sons from her marriage to footballer Jamie O'Hara - Archie, six, Harry, five, and George, three.
Happy family: The new arrival with be Danielle's fourth child, as she already has three sons with footballer Jamie O'Hara - Archie, six, Harry, five, and George, three (above)
She is expecting the new addition with her fiancé Michael O'Neill, who proposed at Claridge's Hotel on Valentine's Day last year.
Danielle, who met Michael in the gym in 2015 a year after divorcing the footballer, recently admitted that their sex life hadn't suffered as a result of the pregnancy.
She recently confessed to Closer: 'We still have a spicy relationship and the sex is far from gone!'
While they only announced they were expecting in February, Danielle was also quick to gush that it will not be their only child together.
'Michael's joked that if we have another boy, we'll have to get on it straight away and try again for a girl!' she added playfully.
